Preparing SFM4CHO medium for the first time taught me the importance of precision and patience.  
From weighing NaHCO₃ to filtering through a 0.2 µm membrane, small steps make big differences in culture performance.

This experience showed me that lab work is part science, part art — and every successful experiment starts with careful preparation.
